css: @font-face{font-family:'Signature';src:url('font.woff2') format('woff2');font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-display:block;}:root{--main-bg:#000;--main-text:#fff7;--main-text-1:#fff;--main-text-2:#fff3;color:var(--main-text);background-color:var(--main-bg);font-size:clamp(16px, 2.5vw, 3vh);--h-full:calc(var(--vh, 1vh) * 100);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif;font-weight:100;}body{margin:0;}header{width:100vw;height:100vh;height:var(--h-full);display:flex;overflow:hidden;position:relative;}h1{font-family:'Signature';color:var(--main-text-1);position:absolute;font-size:10rem;font-weight:100;margin:0;bottom:-0.6rem;display:block;text-align:center;white-space:nowrap;width:100%;opacity:0.6;z-index:2;}h2{position:absolute;color:var(--main-text-2);font-size:1rem;bottom:1rem;margin:0 auto;text-align:center;letter-spacing:0.02em;font-weight:100;width:100%;}h3{font-size:1.2rem;color:var(--main-text-2);margin:6rem auto;letter-spacing:0.02em;font-weight:200;position:relative;display:inline-block;transform:translateX(-50%);left:50%;}h3:first-child{margin-block-start:0;}h3:after{content:"";left:-10%;bottom:-0.5em;width:120%;height:1;position:absolute;background:linear-gradient(90deg, #fff1 0%, #fff3 100%);}a{text-decoration:none;color:inherit;}img{width:100vw;height:100vh;height:var(--h-full);object-fit:contain;}summary,section{line-height:1.4;letter-spacing:0.02em;margin:5rem auto 6rem;width:clamp(320px, 90vw, 800px);}article + article{margin-block-start:3rem;}footer{font-size:0.6rem;text-align:center;letter-spacing:0.05em;margin:5rem auto 1rem;color:var(--main-text-2);width:clamp(320px, 90vw, 800px);}time{opacity:0.6;text-align:center;display:block;font-size:0.7rem;}@media (min-aspect-ratio:1/1){img{margin:0 50%;}}

pages.title: LightOff
pages.content:
Can Akar

Head of Uber EMEA Marketing

I am a seasoned marketing executive with a track record of building top-level teams and delivering visible business results. With unique experience leading diverse organizations across EMEA, Eastern Europe, and APAC, and managing marketing budgets in the hundreds of millions of dollars annually, I have driven significant uplifts in brand recognition and market share.

Throughout my career, I have led world-class campaigns reaching more than a billion people, earning various regional accolades and prestigious awards such as Effie and Cannes Lions. By sponsoring leading sports clubs, partnering with celebrities and opinion leaders, collaborating with TV programs, and making them cultural phenomena, my teams have created powerful and culturally relevant moments celebrating food, traditions, and lifestyle. I have been featured in interviews on networks like NBC and have served as a keynote speaker at various marketing conferences.

With decades of leadership and award-winning creativity, I am shaping the future of brand strategy, elevating organizations through campaigns that stand out and deeply resonate with the audience. I inspire the marketing industry to rethink what’s possible, turning campaigns into movements that ignite loyalty and passion.

Updates

June 20, 2025

Another strong year for Uber Marketing at Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity: 2 Gold Awards, 2 Silver, 6 Bronze.

June 18, 2025

Exploring brand building and leadership in the age of AI and personalisation: a powerful session with Jimmie Stone (Meta) and Nathalia Amadeu (Unilever) at the Meta Beach during Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity.

While methods evolve rapidly, the fundamentals of great marketing remain constant. The challenge and opportunity lies in mastering both. We must continuously invest in training ourselves and our teams across both the timeless principles and the fast-changing tools.
